name: ChatGPT: Shift+Enter to Send
description: ChatGPT専用：EnterとShift+Enterの動作を入れ替えます。Slackと同様に「Enter＝改行」「Shift+Enter＝送信」となるため、違和感なく快適に利用できます。 For ChatGPT only: Swap the behavior of Enter and Shift+Enter. Just like Slack, Enter = line break and Shift+Enter = send, making your ChatGPT experience seamless and intuitive.
